name: Kedi the Game
description:
This game is developed by ''Bit Yavruları''

Our team consists of 5 people;

->Mustafa Hakan Türkmen  - 2D Concept Artist

->Ayşe Berfin Doğan - Developer

->Fatih Emir Duran- 2D Animator

->Akai - 2D Artist

->Orhan Yavuz Erhan - Developer

HOW TO PLAY 

W,A,S,D - Movement

J - Active Speed Buff

K - Dash Buff

L - Vomit

E- Attack

SPACE - QTE
